title: FAQs
content:
FAQs for Baldur's Gate 3 feature different questions with its corresponding answer regarding the game. Please feel free to add any FAQs that are not listed if you know the answer to them. This page covers a list of the frequently asked questions regarding the game.

Baldur's Gate 3 FAQs

What is Baldur's Gate 3's Release Date?

Baldur's Gate 3 Early Access was released on October 6th, 2020.

What Platforms Will Baldur's Gate 3 be Released on?

Baldur's Gate 3 will be playable on PC (Steam & GOG) and Steam Deck

Is there Character Customization?

Is there Co-op Play?

Yes, Baldur's Gate 3 will offer both single-player and cooperative multiplayer modes.
